Class TicketPageController

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
be.helha.applicine.client.controllers.TicketPageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerRequestHandler.Listener, TicketShoppingViewController.TicketViewListener, RequestVisitor
public class TicketPageController extends javafx.application.Application implements TicketShoppingViewController.TicketViewListener, RequestVisitor, ServerRequestHandler.Listener
Controller for the ticket shopping ticket window.
